content: Property Condominium Asked by Benjamin TanAsked on 04 Jun 2019Does anyone here live or rent condos to stay? Could you share how you manage financially. Am looking to do the same 1 answerAnswerBump0

John Ong ZhenxiLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 06 Jun 2019People do that with a close group of friends. 3 bedroom have 5-6 ppl. Condo rent of 2.5-3.5K, each person pays 500-700 dollars.0 comments0
